title: 72/121. Effects of armed conflicts on treaties

paragraphs.1: Expresses its appreciation to the International Law Commission for its continuing contribution to the codification and progressive development of international law;
paragraphs.2: Emphasizes the value of the articles on the effects of armed conflicts on treaties4 in providing guidance to States, and invites States to use the articles as a reference whenever appropriate;
paragraphs.3: Decides that it will revert to the question of the effects of armed conflicts on treaties at an appropriate time.
